article_title: American flag makes pit stop in Omaha as part of 14,000-mile journey through lower 48 states
article_text: The World-Herald marked the 70th anniversary of the attack on Pearl Harbor with a special book honoring the Nebraskans and Iowans who helped the nation win a war. The newspaper's stunning words and photographs capture the sacrifice and commitment of a special generation of Americans. To preview the book and order, visit the OWH Store.

og.description: Along the way, the Nation of Patriots tour visits various VA hospitals, cemeteries and ceremonies. At the Grand Island stop over the weekend, the riders honored the remains of two unknown soldiers’ at Fort McPherson National Cemetery.

The newspaper's stunning words and photographs capture the sacrifice and commitment of a special generation of Americans.
The World-Herald marked the 70th anniversary of the attack on Pearl Harbor with a special book honoring the Nebraskans and Iowans who helped the nation win a war.
To preview the book and order, visit the OWH Store.
